key_talking_points: Florida is currently leading Edmonton 5-4 in the first period with 16:07 remaining.

The tripping penalty committed at 3:32 gives Edmonton an early powerplay opportunity. They'll look to capitalize and tie this game up. The player called for tripping was #8476454.
